title: The Early Access Program for Rider 2025.3 Is Now Open!
description: We’re excited to kick off the Early Access Program (EAP) for Rider 2025.3! With the first preview build now available, you can try out the new features we’ve been working on and let us know what you think. Your feedback plays a vital role in shaping the final release. If you haven’t joined an EAP […]
creator: Angelina Feofilova

title: From AI-Generated to Production-Ready Code: WebStorm Refactorings for the Modern Workflow
description: We’ve all been there. You ask your AI tool to generate a React component, and the initial result works perfectly in the beginning. The AI gives you a functional 250-line component that gets the job done quickly and is exactly what you need for rapid prototyping. But even though AI does indeed excel at generating […]
creator: Jan-Niklas Wortmann

title: The Ktor roadmap and previews
description: As in previous years, we have been working on the Ktor roadmap, and we want to say thank everyone for their contributions and feedback to help us prioritize the roadmap! The OpenAPI and WebRTC support is already in preview since the Ktor 3.3.0 release. Check out the What’s New section for a full overview of […]
creator: Simon Vergauwen

title: Supercharging Unit Test Generation with in-IDE TestSpark
description: Test generation is an essential yet time-consuming part of quality assurance. Automating test-generation techniques means accelerating the development process and improving the quality of the final software. However, traditional automated techniques, and their respective tools, are not usually user-friendly, having a command-line interface and not being integrated with the IDE. To boost acceleration and quality […]
creator: Katie Fraser

title: 개발자 없이도 가능해진 1인 창업 시대  - AI대중화가 바꾼 스타트업 생존 전략
description: AI(인공지능)프로그램의 대중화는 단순한 기술 트렌드를 넘어, 창업 환경 전반을 재구성하고 있습니다. 과거엔 아이디어, 자본, 인력, 개발, 역량 등이 창업 성공의 기본조건이었다면, 이제는 개발자 없이도, 소수 인원으로도 시장 진입이 가능해지는 시대가 왔습니다. 본 포스팅에서는 AI대중화가 어떻게 창업 환경을 변화시키고 있는지, 1인 창엊자 혹은 최소 인력
creator: 고명환

title: IntelliJ IDEA 2025.2.2 Is Out!

You can also download it from our website. Here are the most notable updates included in this version: To find out more details about the […]
creator: Maria Kosukhina

title: 문재인 정부 중국에게 용산 땅 팔아재인 정부 중국에게 용산 땅 팔아
description:
(충격) 이게 실제로 있었군요


와 래알 있네
 
 
영상: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OjbDjlBE9eI



5분대에 나옵니다.
중국 정부에게 실제로 땅을 팔았다고 합니다.
이 거 팔아서 지형이 바뀌는건 아니지만 굳이 왜파냐는거죠
의문을 크게 가져봅니다.
 
이명박시절에 김어준때 방송 보면서 민주당 좋다고 따라 다녔는데 
지금은 생각이 바꼈습니다. 
문재인 정보 파면 팔수록 이상한거 많이 했네요
영상에보면 주한미군 철수도 진행하려고 했는데
이 부분은 북한은 원하지 않았던거 같습니다.
북한도 미국 군대 때문에 중국에 흡수되지 않았다는 사실을 인지하고 있다는군요
creator: SIDNFT

title: 미국에서 스시를 팔기위한 노력 / 캘리포니아 롤
description:
영상: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rE_FAwhBo9Y



 
아무리 좋다고해도 그들의 벽은 높다.
나는 이 벽을 적응하고 넘어야한다.
 
요즘은 채소나 해초도 건강식이라고 좋아하다.
거의 60년이 지나서 ...
creator: SIDNFT

title: Enhancements to XAML Live Preview in Visual Studio for .NET MAUI
description:
The XAML Live Preview feature in Visual Studio 2022 version 17.14 introduces a significant usability improvement for .NET MAUI projects: the XAML Live Preview window is now available during design time, eliminating the requirement to initiate a debug session. This change streamlines the UI development workflow for .NET MAUI applications. Design-Time Availability Previously, XAML Live […]
The post Enhancements to XAML Live Preview in Visual Studio for .NET MAUI appeared first on Visual Studio Blog.
creator: Rachel Kang (SHE/HER)

title: 8 Common DevOps Problems And How to Solve Them With GoLand
description: One of the most popular posts on the /devops subreddit says, “After 24 years in IT, I’m done. I don’t want to debug another YAML file. This is not how I foresee spending my life.” DevOps can be frustrating, and the 3,000+ people who upvoted that post clearly agree. It doesn’t have to be this […]
creator: Olga Bedrina
